{"id":216072270,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 9 months","timestamp":1553024963,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/216072270/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int digitSquareSum(int n) {\n        int sum = 0, tmp;\n        while (n) {\n            tmp = n % 10;\n            sum += tmp * tmp;\n            n /= 10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n        cin.tie(NULL);\n        cout.tie(NULL);\n        int slow, fast;\n        slow = fast = n;\n        do {\n            slow = digitSquareSum(slow);\n            fast = digitSquareSum(fast);\n            fast = digitSquareSum(fast);\n        } while(slow != fast);\n        if (slow == 1) return 1;\n        else return 0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
